DOC.brief_summary: The main intention study compare two ultrasound-guided central venous catheterization procedure namely : real-time , ultrasound-guided , plane axillary vein catheterization real-time , ultrasound-guided , plane jugular vein catheterization term venipuncture , catheterization success , early mechanical complication catheter-related infection rate mechanically ventilate patient admit intensive care unit .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Guided Axillary Versus Jugular Central Venous Catheterization
DOC.criteria: mechanically ventilate intensive care patient clinical indication central venous line placement trauma hematoma catheterization site major blood coagulation disorder coincide active bleeding anatomical abnormality catheterization site infection catheterization site age le 18 year lack patient closest relative consent
